extendedInfo.description: Keypad S is a super dialer for Android phones. You could use it to search for apps, bookmarks, contact names, email addresses, phone numbers. All in one place.How to use?1. Type in the query using the number keys with corresponding letters: e.g. 36245 for "email" app2. The search results will instantly appear on top as you type3. Click the icon in search results to open it, or click the phone key to dial the numberAlphabet mapEnglish alphabet is printed on the number keys. For example, "æå¡ æ²»è«" â "Tezuka Osamu".* ä¸­æä¸­æï¼ç®/ç¹ï¼éè¿æ±è¯­æ¼é³å¯¹åºå°è±æ26ä¸ªå­æ¯ãÃ¼ç±vä»£æ¿ãä¾å¦ï¼"é©æ" â "Han Yv"Tips* You don't have to type in the full query. As soon as you see the entry you are looking for, tap on it.* Long pressing the del key will clear input box* Long pressing the phone key will open call log* Long pressing an contact icon will open contact editor* Long pressing an app will open its info page: force stop, uninstall, etc.Your feedbacks are welcomedCredits:* Big thanks to Daniel Bogard for helping us fixing the problem!

reviews.title: Good app launcher but can be more customizable
reviews.comment: Fast way to launch apps and call people. However, it would be much better if you can specify the types of items to be indexed and appear in the search results.
reviews.author: Marc Fong

reviews.title: Elegant
reviews.comment: Such a beautiful interface, simple and clean. There\'s no clutter of large buttons and list fulls of numbers, instead clear crisp numbers, contact icons,and app icons. PLEASE FIX:: Option to turn off certain searches would be nice. I don\'t really use my phone as ann app starter too often. :: Option to set as default dialer
reviews.author: Kareem G

reviews.title: Gives me my \"just type\"fix!
reviews.comment: What a great app! Similar to just type on old webOS or universal search.  My only request would be a full keyboard with number row rather than using letters on numbered keys to stay more consistent with user experience.  Thank you for this!
reviews.author: Tim DeWitt

reviews.title: Replace That Dumbo Dialer ASAP
reviews.comment: Excellent replacement for the geek that doesn\'t settle for stock functionalities. Super stable dialer replacement / enhancement.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gr8 app
reviews.comment: Just wish it could do indexing faster and when phone starts so then I wouldn\'t have to wait to use this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but needs options
reviews.comment: Would love to be able to turn off bookmarks in the results, as I never search for them. Otherwise great.
reviews.author: Jared Vidrine

reviews.title: HTC one x
reviews.comment: Just smooth and simple everything at your finger tip
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: So far i haven\'t really found much use for this, especially since it lags like a biyatch and often crashes my phone. I optimistically give it 3 stars having faith that they\'ll get it right eventually. I\'ll change my rating if justified.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Constant Re-Indexing
reviews.comment: This is possibly the most frustrating app ever. Every single time I launch this the app performs an index. Every single time and it takes at least 90 seconds every single time. For an app that supposed to save time, this sure does the opposite. This is a real shame as the developer\'s other apps are amazing.
reviews.author: Joshua May

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.comment: Great app, however refreshing index should not happen when I am trying to actively use it. This slows it down when it happens. However this is an occasional annoyance, and it great overall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but needs more options
reviews.comment: Its really good app. Something i have been searching since long time. It could use more options like what kind of results you want lije only apps or only contacts
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect...
reviews.comment: I love this dialer and use it to find everything I need quickly.  The only thing that\'s missing is the ability to paste numbers into it.  Give me that, and stock dialer is yesterday\'s news.
reviews.author: Chris Cardwell

reviews.title: Useful!
reviews.comment: I don\'t have to launch the app drawer anymore it\'s great. When I place this app on a slot though, it just shows an android guy instead of the image of the super dialer. How can I fix that, since its a minor issue?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Convenient
reviews.comment: Has pretty much replaced my app drawer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Functionally excellent, annoying with rating request
One of my must have apps
reviews.comment: This is one of the most useful apps I have ever used. It is up there with gesture search as far as functionality goes. The only suggestion I have is to be able to add more things to search. For example, the sdcard with the option to search it indexed, not indexed, or not include it in the search at all. And also other stuff, but the sdcard would be a great feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant!!
reviews.comment: Got this just to support u and im glad i did that cuz im absolutely loving it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sjukt smidigt!
reviews.comment: G\303\266r det riktigt snabbt och smidigt att komma \303\245t i princip allt i telefonen! Skulle f\303\245tt fem stj\303\244rnor om det gick att tvinga appen att h\303\245lla sig ig\303\245ng hela tiden f\303\266r att g\303\266ra det \303\244nnu lite snabbare. :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s great, and fast
reviews.comment: Wish it could work with Swype..
reviews.author: Elias Moosman
